SEARCH

Uses of Interface
java.lang.foreign.MemoryLayout

Packages that use MemoryLayoutPREVIEW
Package
Description
java.lang.foreign
Provides low-level access to memory and functions outside the Java runtime.

  • Uses of MemoryLayoutPREVIEW in java.lang.foreign
